title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Passenger
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Passenger 

Ships) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (passenger ships) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 2. Schedule 2 to the European Union (Passenger Ships) Regulations 2019
text_raw:
2. Schedule 2 to the European Union (Passenger Ships) Regulations 2019 
(S.I. No. 676 of 2019) is amended in the Sea Area entry entitled West Coast of 
Ireland, by substituting for the second row (in relation to “Ballaghaline Point to 
Trawkeera Point”) the following two rows: 

“ 

Hag’s Head 
to 
Ballaghaline 
Point 

Ballaghaline 
Point to 
Trawkeera 
Point 

X 

X 

✓ 

X 

X 

X 

✓* 

X 

Doolin to 
Cliffs of 
Moher 

* Doolin 
to Inisheer 
from 1 
March to 
31 October 

”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 March, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

1 OJ L 163, 25.6.2009, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [108] 3

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: (This note is not part of the legal instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the legal instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend Schedule 2 to the European Union (Passenger 
Ships) Regulations 2019, which give effect to Directive 2009/45/EC of the 
European Parliament and of the Council on safety rules and standards for 
passenger ships, by updating the Sea Areas for the West Coast of Ireland. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [108]
